PageWidgetPortable.Title: Parcelas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>FN_PARCELAREMESSAS.CUSTOM.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>true</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.REMESSA = @CAMPO(HANDLE) AND A.PARCELA IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FN_PARCELAS WHERE REMESSA = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/e/financeiro/zoomdeparcelas/Form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
